title: jEnu bandide
sahitya:
jEnu bandide janaru jEnu koLLiro


caraNam 1    madhuravAda kombujEnu mdhavana smaraNe sadaravAda janarigilla janana maraNavAidU bage satta 
sAyadavarige para ihangaLeraDu uNTu namma padmanAbhana nAma smaraNe sadana mADikombavarige
    caraNam 2    ondu ariya ondu balla ajnanAda ajAmiLanu kanda nAragendu kUgi kareda mAtradi 
andu avana salahida ananta shrI vAsudEva nandagOpana sundara kanda navanItacOranemba
    caraNam 3    IrELu lOkadalli iruva kastUri ranga mAruva Aru sEru jEnu tuppa aggavAgide idanaridu 
bEga nIvu indirEshana dhyAnavannu svAmi purandara viTTala smaraNeyemba divya
